name: A Haunting : Witching Hour
description: The little town of Shady Hollow is known for dark legends of centuries past. The most famous of these is the legend of the Witch of Shady Hollow, a phantom woman who haunts the descendants of those who wrongfully condemned her of being a witch.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better Storage: 4 GB available space
